author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Thursday announced solatium to families of 23 persons, who died in various incidents across the State in August, September and October last year.

Expressing her condolences to the bereaved families, Ms. Jayalalithaa said in a statement that the solatium would be granted from the Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund.

While the families of six employees of Tangedco and nine others, who were electrocuted in separate incidents would receive a solatium of Rs. 3 lakh each, families of eight persons, who died in other incidents would receive Rs. 1 lakh each, she said.

Three contract labourers, who suffered injuries during an accident in the Mettur Thermal Power Station on October 19, last year would receive a relief of Rs. 50,000 each.
title: Solatium announced
